column5: Thanks to everyone one more time as with out the donations or bids we would not have raised over $3000 from the auction. My wife and I are so overwhelmed by the way this turned out.
Amazing Mike!  You two, and everyone that donated prizes and made the winning bids, deserve a huge round of applause
awesome news Mike, glad it turned out good.

You guys did an ABSOLUTELY AMAZING JOB - Congratulations to everybody involved... you put together a fantastic little auction and I think you really blew everybody away with the support you received from the folks who donated prizes and those who stepped up and made bids!  Congratulations and I can't thank you guys enough for all the support you've given us with the Fish-a-Thon over the past few years.  Without the time and generosity of folks like yourselves it wouldn't be what it's become today!  Mike & Danna - you guys are simply awesome!  Ciao for now, Ryan
Trulyamazing job by you and Danna and everyoneels that supported this worthwhile cause.
Fantastic work, Mike and the Mrs.- you guys put a great effort in to this, and it paid off!!! Wow, $3000 is nothing to shake a stick at! Great job.
Thanks everyone our part was fun and rewarding we were and still are amazed at how it turned out.
Awesome job Mike and Family...Can't wait for this years Fish-A-Thon..Nothing I like better then helping to Kick Cancers Ass!!  What a truly great thing you guys have done!!!!!!
